content: is there such a thing as  \"spotify\" for CC-licensed tunes????

Yes, there are several platforms that offer a similar service to Spotify but exclusively for Creative Commons-licensed tunes. Some popular options include:

1. Jamendo: It is a music platform that offers a collection of CC-licensed music for streaming and downloading. Artists can upload their music under various CC licenses, giving users a wide range of options.

2. SoundCloud: While not exclusively focused on CC-licensed music, SoundCloud allows artists to choose the type of license their tracks are released under. Many artists opt for Creative Commons licenses, making it a great platform to discover and stream CC-licensed content.

3. Free Music Archive: It is an online library of high-quality, legal audio downloads. It includes a vast collection of CC-licensed tracks, allowing users to browse and stream music based on their preferred license type.

These platforms provide a similar streaming experience to Spotify but focus specifically on music released under Creative Commons licenses, providing a wider range of freely available and easily accessible tunes.
